name: Smellman Von Yurenblat's ROCKETHAUS FUN TIME: THE GAME!
name_original: Smellman Von Yurenblat's ROCKETHAUS FUN TIME: THE GAME!
description:
CLICK BUTTON BELOW GAME WINDOW TO ENABLE FULLSCREEN

Hey, I started learning Unity! In a recent course, I was taught how to make a simple maze navigation game starring what (I absolutely swear) is a rocket ship.

CONTROLS:

  • A: Rotate counterclockwise (left)
  • D: Rotate clockwise (right)
  • Space: Boost

OBJECTIVE:

  • Get from the Blue Launch Pad to the Green Landing Pad.

FEATURES:

  • THREE (3!) slapdash designed levels, some featuring (echovoice) ONE. MOVING. OBSTACLE. 
  • ONE MENU!
  • A ROUGH TIMER APPROXIMATION!
  • ALL ASPECTS SUBJECT TO CHAAAAAANGE!

If you don't want to play in browser, you can download it for WINDOWS! (Mac version to come?)

Enjoy!
